span.span: This application was written in Visual Basic for Applications. A total of 47 tables were built. A fully commprehensive dossier of vendors and clients, and their related products was built. The application has the ability to maintain state of any number of lines. Several reports were drawn up that would query the database, in real time, and give accurate data on current workload, pace of and and all lines, and expected output for any time in the future. This is a networked application.
